name: unified-test-framework
description: Unified testing framework supporting both Cypress and Playwright with Cucumber BDD

scripts.test:playwright: cross-env TEST_RUNNER=playwright cucumber-js && npm run report:debug
scripts.test:playwright:parallel: cross-env TEST_RUNNER=playwright cucumber-js --parallel 4 && npm run report:debug
scripts.test:playwright:tag: cross-env TEST_RUNNER=playwright cucumber-js --tags $TAG && npm run report:debug
scripts.test:cypress: cross-env TEST_RUNNER=cypress CYPRESS_PREPROCESSOR=esbuild cypress run --browser chrome --env DEVICE=desktop && npm run report:debug
scripts.test:cypress:headed: cross-env TEST_RUNNER=cypress CYPRESS_PREPROCESSOR=esbuild cypress run --browser chrome --env DEVICE=desktop --headed && npm run report:debug
scripts.test:cypress:tag: cross-env TEST_RUNNER=cypress CYPRESS_PREPROCESSOR=esbuild cypress run --browser chrome --env DEVICE=desktop TAGS=$TAG && npm run report:debug
scripts.test:device: cross-env TEST_RUNNER=$RUNNER DEVICE=$DEVICE BROWSER=$BROWSER HEADED=$HEADED cucumber-js && npm run report:debug
scripts.test:all-devices: npm run test:all-devices:playwright && npm run test:all-devices:cypress
scripts.test:all-devices:playwright: npm run test:playwright:device:iphone && npm run test:playwright:device:pixel && npm run test:playwright:device:ipad && npm run test:playwright:device:android-tablet
scripts.test:all-devices:cypress: npm run test:cypress:device:iphone && npm run test:cypress:device:pixel && npm run test:cypress:device:ipad && npm run test:cypress:device:android-tablet
scripts.test:playwright:device:iphone: cross-env TEST_RUNNER=playwright DEVICE=iPhone BROWSER=chrome cucumber-js && npm run report:debug
scripts.test:playwright:device:pixel: cross-env TEST_RUNNER=playwright DEVICE=pixel BROWSER=chrome cucumber-js && npm run report:debug
scripts.test:playwright:device:ipad: cross-env TEST_RUNNER=playwright DEVICE=iPad BROWSER=chrome cucumber-js && npm run report:debug
scripts.test:playwright:device:android-tablet: cross-env TEST_RUNNER=playwright DEVICE=androidTablet BROWSER=chrome cucumber-js && npm run report:debug
scripts.test:cypress:device:iphone: cross-env TEST_RUNNER=cypress CYPRESS_PREPROCESSOR=esbuild cypress run --browser chrome --env DEVICE=iPhone && npm run report:debug
scripts.test:cypress:device:pixel: cross-env TEST_RUNNER=cypress CYPRESS_PREPROCESSOR=esbuild cypress run --browser chrome --env DEVICE=pixel && npm run report:debug
scripts.test:cypress:device:ipad: cross-env TEST_RUNNER=cypress CYPRESS_PREPROCESSOR=esbuild cypress run --browser chrome --env DEVICE=iPad && npm run report:debug
scripts.test:cypress:device:android-tablet: cross-env TEST_RUNNER=cypress CYPRESS_PREPROCESSOR=esbuild cypress run --browser chrome --env DEVICE=androidTablet && npm run report:debug
scripts.test:parallel: concurrently "npm run test:playwright:parallel" "npm run test:cypress" && npm run report:debug
scripts.clean: powershell -Command "if(Test-Path reports) { Remove-Item -Path reports -Recurse -Force }; New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path reports,reports/screenshots,reports/videos,reports/cucumber"
scripts.setup: npm install && npx playwright install && npx cypress install && npm run clean
scripts.test:cypress:tags: cross-env TEST_RUNNER=cypress CYPRESS_PREPROCESSOR=esbuild cypress run --browser chrome --env DEVICE=desktop TAGS=%TAGS% && npm run report:debug
